name: WorldWackIII: Jan 2020
description:
This is an experiment where I'm trying to make one game a month this year with mini games that revolve around event that happened this month. This is obviously in the very early stages of testing but I wanted to release something before the month is over! Please give feedback! Thanks!

Note: It's only been tested on Mac. HTML5 version was too big for itch.io so I'll post a link soon to it. If the HTML5 is slow, there is an option to disable videos that should speed it up.
